content: description the coffeeshop cardigan was inspired by all things cozy it s the perfect housecoat to throw on over leggings and an oversized tee the homespun yarn gives it the perfect amount of rustic handmade feel the pattern uses half_double_crochet throughout for easy stitching this pattern is available free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a kit through the lion brand website 2 use code jan45 at checkout for 45% off 1 http //www eandpcrochet com/the-coffeeshop-cardigan/ 2 http //shrsl com/22egp
